response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $11,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 11500}
